verses.text: Worthy, worthy is the Lamb, Worthy, worthy is the Lamb That was slain.
Savior, let Thy kingdom come! Now the power of sin consume, Bring Thy blest millennium, Holy Lamb.
Thus may we each moment feel, Love Him, serve Him, praise Him still, Till we all on Zion's hill See the Lamb.

refrain.text: Glory, hallelujah! Praise Him, hallelujah! Glory, hallelujah! To the Lamb!
